string.value: It looks like you've collected all components to the #rBlack Key#k...\n\nI can forge it for you and in return this will give me the practice I need to prove to my forgemaster that I'm ready for my own forge...

In order to do so, I'll need a handful of resources;

- #r10 Firewood#k to house the fire
- #r10 Slate#k to forge the mold for the key
- #r4 Leathers#k to craft gloves that can withstand the heat

Lastly, we'll need something hot, really hot. The #rFlaming Feather#k should do it. You can get one from the #rFire Boars#k in the #bScorching Valley#k.
Let's see, were you able to collect everything on the list?

Ahhhhh, yes! This should do it and my master will be most pleased...Let me stoke the fire and smash the hammer...

(Eleska lights the logs with the flaming feather and before you know it, the #rBlack Key#k is ready)

Here ya are, it's quite cool to touch actually, don't be afraid.
This won't do, we'll need everything on the list to forge the key...
Oh, a traveller!! Look at my brother, he's dying, not really, but you wouldn't know any better would you? I mean, my god, look at this guy.

He's throwing a fit, dying if you will, because a monster ran off with this water. Could you hunt down the #rnearby monsters#k and find which one took his #rwater#k?\n\nWe've been following this #rmap#k for days and can't figure it out. We checked the mountain but didn't see a way up, maybe you can find it. It's yours in return for the #rwater#k...
I've got the map still, it's your's if you help my brother... For both our sakes...
Good lord, quick, we gotta give it to him before he melts into a puddle. He won't, but he thinks so...\n\nHere's the #rmap#k in return. Good luck figuring it out, we could not...
Did you got the got dayum water? This guy's losin it!

Alright, now listen up!

Where I come from, there was order! Men did this and women did that and there was no crossing the lines! As such, I chose to inspect rocks, because well, boys like rocks right?

Don't get me wrong, I like rocks... However, can't a man love fashion as well? I mean look at my hat, GORGEOUS! Oh boy, I do love hats as well...

As a matter of fact, don't tell my family, but I came here to collect HATS! Not fossils!

I'm afraid I've wasted too much time hiding my real joy and I'm not quite strong enough to collect them in this region. Would you help out?

I need each one of the #rbamboo#k hats to complete my collection...

Ooooooooweeeeeeeee, these are so cute!

I knew I spotted another #rfashionista#k in the wild. As a token of my appreciation, here is my prized #rFashionista #2#k!

Now, run off and don't tell anyone we had this conversation...

It's you! I've been waiting for you to make your way here...\n\nWe've been trying to access the vault for quite some time. It is believed that the statues hold the key to access, but no one has been able to solve them. Can you solve the riddles?
Doesn't look like you've collected the #rBlack Vault Key#k yet...\n\nTake a look at your riddle and listen to what the statues have to say...
Do you have it?!?
We mustn't waste any time!\n\nQuick, use the key to access #bThe Vault#k!

Come find me...

I suppose if you are able to hunt me down, you should be capable of hunting down the things I need.

I'm somewhere in #bKora City#k...
That looks yummy... I demand you bring that here at once!
That looks yummy... I demand you bring that here at once!
Let's see, did you get all the materials? That was pretty quick if so.
Doesn't look like you have everything yet. Get back out there and find those materials!

Amazing! These will help me progress!

As promised, let me teach ya a thing or two about crafting:

#eNew Skill:#n #rForge Lvl. 1#k

Don't let me forget, here's your #rguide book#k!

#eAs you get stronger you will unlock new recipes, so check your recipes often.#n

Additionally, some of the inhabitants of this zone might have additional "#rhidden#k" recipes if you ask around and pay attention!

Oh! It's you again!

You cleared the vault, huh? You may just have what it takes to be a forge master after all.

Yeah, I think I see it, you could be one if you really practice.

If you can gather up some rare materials for me. I can teach you some basic crafting skills. I'll need the following items to make it happen:

#e1.#n #rMaple Leaf#k
#e2.#n #rMoon Rock#k
#e3.#n #rStar Rock#k

These items can be tough to get, but if you are capable, you should be able to do it...

Oh, thank you! It's the hero of the #bThe Vault#k! I need someone like you. Do you see all this walking stone? It seems that the life of #bThe Forge#k is being drained by these stone creatures. They walk aimlessly, fighting anything that gets nearby.

One of my informants let me know that the Fairies needed help out here, so I came as fast as I could. Could you help us fight back?

There are so many...
Before I left the forest, we had a #rweird stone#k fall from the sky. It's your's if you help us fight back the automatons.
Did we push them back? Are the automatons still in control?
Doesn't look like we've pushed the automatons back far enough yet, they are running rampant...\n\nPlease help us.
Thank you so much, #h #!\n\nThe fairies are forever grateful. Here is that #rstone#k I talked about. It has an odd glow inside of it. Maybe it's useful to you?

"Get out of my way!" "No, you get out of the way."

(small scuffle ensues and the ladies gather their composure)

"Hey!" They both said at the same time.

Robin: We need some new gear, well, me really, I need it badly.

Corine: No she doesn't... Look at my cute tiger, I need to get him food and I can't afford both food and gear...

Robin: Always, on and on with the "cute little tiger"... She's doing just fine, she comes from wealth. I been working hard to get where I am, but who doesn't need a little help every once in a while? Plus, I think you're pretty cute myself...

Corine: Hun, pretend she's not here. She make's up stuff all the time. Can a girl get some luv?

(I'll have to choose one I guess...)

Uhhhh, hi... I'm a bit-t-tt-t sc-sc-scared up here...

I was inspecting the ruins and th-th-th-then this stone came to life and started attacking me... I climbed as fast as I c-c-c-co-could. I'm not coming back down without some help...

Could you find a way for me to get back to camp?
I'm n-n-n-ot so sure about this... There are so many of them...

Did you find a way for me to get back to c-ca-c-camp?

(Yeah sure, you are gonna have to #rfly#k!)

Absolutely not.

(I promise, the fairy wings are some of the strongest flight materials available, I'll be right by your side)

O-o-ok-kay... Here goes nothing I guess...

(I assure her that the wings are very strong and imbued with magical properties to keep her afloat)

O-k-k-kay, if you s-s-s-sa-say so...

(Della takes the #rFairy Wing Cape#k and flys back to camp)
N-n-n-no not yet, I guess...

#eCome see me at camp#n and I'll make a trade with you!I want that #rGold Ore#k!

I can move that pretty well through #bBlack Market#k. Have you been there? I don't suppose so, you don't look very wealthy...

Here's a deal, I've got this old #rtreasure map#k. I've gone looking for the #rtreasure#k a few times now, but I haven't the time anymore and I just can't find it. I'll give it to you for a couple #rgold ore#k? I can at least recuperate my costs that way.

Ah, there you are. Yeah, like I said, I'm just too busy to solve this puzzle. I've been collecting so much stuff, and so many people want to buy from me. I can't be arsed anymore. You look like a bright cookie, why don't you solve it? I'm sure there is a good reward for it.
Great! Here's the #rmap#k, and I'll take those #rgold ore#k. Good luck out there!
You don't seem to have the ore anymore? What happened? I'll give you the #rmap#k for two #rgold ore#k...
What? You lost the map? Here it is again... Don't ask why I have copies.

Hello friend.

I am Scon.

I am your friend.

(why is he talking like this? "Hey Scon, I'm #h #")

Oh? You speak the same language as me? Haha, that's great! I wasn't sure since I'm not from around here. This will make negotiations easy then.
Alright, come chat when you have the "bads". Ha, see what I did there?
Well, that's fine. I'll keep it to myself then.

You see, where I'm from. You get stronger by having bad gear, and I mean really bad. Doesn't make sense, right?

It used to be the same as here, but everyone got so strong, the Maple gods, flipped the tables on us and started rewarding casual players. Who knew?

So now, I've come here. To an earlier time where the gear ain't so great, ya know?

(that one stings a little, but okay)

Could you find me some of the worst possible gear? I mean #rterrible#k gear. These items should roll with #r0 main stats#k on them... I need #eone#n of the following items:

#e1.#n #rBronze Ring#k
#e2.#n #rWhite Gomushin#k
#e3.#n #rWork Gloves#k

Could you find one for me? I've got goodies to trade for in-return.

Ah, shit. My leg is killing me and my potions aren't helping. I've been drinking them like crazy.

(obviously, he is covered in potion substance and there are bottles everywhere)

I need something stronger to get out of here. Could you help me out?
Check with the people at #bcamp#k. One of them might have a #rrecipe#k to get me back on my feet.
Eh? Really, just gonna leave me here to die?
Do you have something to help?
That's gotta be strong enough to heal me up. Quick, hand it over.
#bFeylorn#k springs to his feet in an instant.\n\nJust like those #e"beans"#n from Scon's world.. Ha! And I feel stronger than ever before? Maybe I'm like his people?
Oh god, I'm done for aren't I? Please don't let me die like this.

Hey, #h #!

I heard about you from #bDoofus#k. He said you been helping out around #bKora#k quite a bit. I thought I might see you some time.

I'm the local #rPet Master#k. Really, I just help young explorers like yourself learn to raise their pets and teach them new skills.

Would you like to learn a new skill today? First one ain't too bad, talk to #bUtah#k and come back with a #rgolden egg#k!
Why don't you chat with #bUtah#k and see if he can help.
He seems like he hasn't finished his chores yet... Could you chat with him?
Did you check in with #bUtah#k?

Oh, you have the #rgolden egg#k? How did you get that? That was supposed to be #bUtah's#k job this morning... Ah well, if you are quick enough to get the egg, then your pet should be able to keep up, right?

Let me teach you a new skill:

#eNew Skill:#n #rFast Pet#k

That should help you out quite a bit. I know we get quite speed around here, and this will allow your pets to keep up with you! Isn't that great?
Maybe when you are stronger even yet, I'll have some additional goodies for you? Who knows! Get out there, train and raise those pets.\n\nI gotta talk to my nephew about this "egg" business.
Well, what do you have? Were you able to get the samples?
There they are. Thank you. The #bmages guild#k doesn't need to know I didn't do the work and you can save #bFeylorn#k. Thank you!
You don't have the samples yet. I'll need those before we can stike a deal.
You need help from me? No, no, no, no... I need help from #eYOU#n.

When I joined the #bmages guild#k, I thought I would be studying. An academic, ya know? Once I got in, they started talking about "best farmers", "full map aoe", "minimal movement". Then they sent me off on my own to gather these samples. I don't want to battle monsters, I want to study!

That's where you come in. There are monsters, within the ruins. I need a couple samples from them. Could you help with those?

I'll need one #rlarge sample#k and one #rsmall sample#k. Should be the #rGuardian#k and #rSentinel#k monsters that drop them.

Report back once you have those.

I can give you a #rrare ticket#k (chair or gachapon, your choice) in return.

(What about a recipe for a #rpowerful potion#k, have any of those?)

 Oh, we have lots of recipes where I come from. Sure I'll throw one of those in there as well!
Did you get all the materials? I'm running out of time over here...

Oh you have them, thank you so much. This will allow me to correct the orders.\n\nYou know what, I don't actually need this #rSteel Ore#k, I found some in the tent. Seems like it could be useful to you though...
#eOh my, did you hear that?#n That was so loud, sounds like something changed in the ruins. You better go check it out.
Looks like you don't have all the materials yet. Please collect them all!

I messed up, #h #.

I was a swingin and a swangin my hammer, pumpin out orders like it was no-ones business.

Then when I finished? I realized I built the wrong items...

I need more crafting materials pronto.
Amazing, get out there and get those materials, the people are waiting!
Seriously??? I really need your help...
I've got an old recipe, from a book written long ago. It's yours in return for the materials. What do you say?
Quick, over here, I need help!

Hey, #h #! Welcome to #bManaforge#k. Your at the base camp right now, just outside the ruins.

I lead the excavation team here. Our goal is to learn all of the Forge's secrets, particularly, what is wrong with it...

You heard that right, something's wrong. The forge seems to be dying and the automatons protecting it are overwhelming the lands.

#eWe'll need you to help us save the forge...#n

You can start by helping one of our own as #bShawn#k just got back from an excursion and let me know that #bFeylorn#k is hurt in the ruins. He was our fighter before, but I guess that is going to have to be you now!

When you are ready, the ruins will accept you and allow you to enter, hurry and help #bFeylorn#k!
Has the #bQueen's#k newest disciple finished her request yet?
Why yes, yes "I" have in fact. Thank you for handing these over. I'll be sure to let the #bQueen#k know of your work.
Oh! You wanted something in return? Fine, take this #rFashionista Card#k. You'll need it...
Not enough! The #bQueen#k expects better of her disciples!
I, sir Roger. Hereby declare, that I need your help. The real #bQueen#k has sent me on a mission of utmost importance and it is up to me (you) to gather the supplies.

(you can't help but ask about his skin)

My skin, you say? No, I'm not a ghost. This is a beautiful skin color given to me by the #bQueen#k herself. You could only be so lucky to don it.

Hold on, back to the matter at hand. The #bQueen#k demands #rcrystalized eyes#k for her powders and tinctures. Collect them and report to me at once!

#h #, as you can see, the forge is dying. I've been here, trying to keep it going, but there's almost nothing left to it. It's heart is black as night.\n\nMaybe, if we work together, we can restore it? I was not able to alone.
You should start with #bFrancois#k, he is from the #bmages guild#k and they have texts that go back eons. He may know something.
I suppose the forge doesn't have to live on. You'll just stay weak forever, pleb.

Huh? The forge is dying? How can I help?

(Moki thought there might be something in those books of yours that talks about powering the forge?)

(Francois pulls out a very, very old book and begins flipping through the pages gently as to not ruin the book)

Hmm... I see here it talks of "restoring the forge" but much of it is too worn to read. Towards the end I see something about a "#rwhite mage#k". Does that make any sense to you?
Oh great, you were able to locate #bFeylorn#k. Were you able to help him out yet?
I hope he is going to be okay...\n\nYou'll also need to figure out how to get to the Forge. #bMoki#k is waiting for you. He needs help to save the heart.
My friend, come closer. We haven't much time...

Oh, hello traveler! What's that? The Forge? What is that?

(Grendel fits the description of a "white mage", but he doesn't seem to know anything about it. "Grendel, I need you to think clearly about the forge, do you remember it?)

I'm sorry young traveler, I don't know of a forge. ("Grendel, please, the #bManaforge#k is dying.)

(his eyes grow wide, almost like a long lost memory has come back.)

Now that's a term I haven't heard in quite some time. I've been around for ages ya know? You found your way to the #bManaforge#k?

(Yes, and it's dying, I need your help. We need to craft "The Heart of the Forge", but we don't know how, do you know anything?)

Do I know anything? I wrote the recipe young lad... To get started, we'll need the essence of #rAncient Fire Golem#k and #rAncient Ice Golem#k.

(Hmm, I've not seen those monsters yet.)

Well, I'm not surprised, they don't exist anymore! We'll have to go back in time. You are going to need this pendant.

(Grendel pulls out a light blue pendant with a swirling mass on the inside.)

While wearing this, you will be able to travel back to when the #bManaforge#k was thriving. There you will fight the monsters you seek and be able to get the necessary crafting materials to restore the forge.

(How does it work?)

Revisit the ruins where you first met #rIce#k and #rFire#k golems. The pendant will take care of the rest. Once you have collected the #ressence#k, bring them back to me.
This isn't enough, we'll need all 20 (10 of each) to harness enough power to stabilize the essence.
Did you collect them all? I should be able to harness the essence to form solid materials.

There that should do it. Now just let me...

(Grendel is really struggling with this task.)

What's that young lad? You don't think I got what it takes anymore!

(Grendel seemingly powers up and in a flash of light, two stones are formed and floating above each of his hands.)

See? I still got it. The #bManaforge#k won't die on my watch.

(Grendel falls to the ground and the stones fall as well. Grendel!)\n\n(He wakes up but doesn't seem to remember what happened. I try talking to him about the #bManaforge#k again, but he doesn't recall. When I asked him about the stones, he said to talk to his apprentice, #rFrancois#k.)

Grendel passed out? Is he okay?

(Yes, he is fine, but he doesn't have any recollection of the events that transpired. He told me to come talk to you and that you may know what to do with the stones.)

(Francois, begins looking through that same book again.)

There is barely any text left here, it reads "...sacrifice the stones."

(Sacrifice? I thought we need them for the #rHeart#k?)

I can't help you there, I can only read what's written in the book. Maybe #bMoki#k knows something?

Hey! Do you have the heart yet?

(No, not yet, but I am getting close. I collected these stones and #rFrancois#k said all he could find in his books was the word "sacrifice". Do you know anything about that?)

"Sacrifice"? No, I don't know anything about that. Maybe it's best we do a sweep in and around the ruins?
Do you have the heart? I can take it from there.
You don't have the heart yet, we don't have much time left.

The heart! You have it. Let me see it, quick!

(#bMoki#k holds it against the black heart, pulls back his arm, hammer in hand and gently taps the heart with his eyes closed. He and the heart begin to glow. Nothing happens, but then... you hear a feint noise...)

(It starts slow and quiet................ thump............... thump........... thump...... thump.. thump)

(It builds up and the room begins to swirl! The heart breaks free from it's black casing. The glass shards shatter all around you. As you open your eyes, you are greeted with a beautiful blue shine. The heart lives on and the #Manaforge#k lives once more!!!)
You did it! You solved the mysteries of the ruins and these lands. You crafted the #rHeart of the Forge#k, proved your worth as an aspiring forge master and conquered #bZone 4#k!

Oh, a new traveler! Hey there, my name is Todd. This is where I teach new travelers like you #bhow to hunt monsters#k. You won't find monsters in Mushroom Town, but if you venture a little bit outside, those places are in fact full of them. It'll be quite dangerous for you to go there, if you aren't well-prepared for it.

Let's first discuss the #bbasic attack#k. You can do that by pressing the #bCtrl key#k. Approach the monster, but not too close that you'll touch it, then attack with authority. Got it? Do you want to try it right now?

You see the #rJr. Sentinel#k there? Try attacking it. Normally it's a powerful monster, but Grendel the Really Old, the head of all magicians, put a seal on it just for beginners like you, so you'll have no trouble practicing your swings against it.

Once you successfully hunt the Jr. Sentinel, you'll earn Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece as a dropping. To pick up an item, press #bZ#k on top of the item, so try picking up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k and give it to #bPeter#k. He'll teach you how to use skills to attack monsters.
Hmmm... are you afraid to go up against a monster? Don't worry about it. Practice makes perfect, and you'll be good at it in no time.
Seeing you with Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece, I see that Todd has taught you well on hunting. That means you're fairly aware of the basics of hunting... now I'll teach you how to #buse skills#k.

Skills can be checked out by pressing #bK#k to open the skill window. Unlike regular attacks, skills can only be used by raising the skill level using Skill Points. You can earn Skill Points by leveling up, but you need to be careful when assigning those points to different skills.

The effectiveness of the skills differ greatly, based on the level. For example, the Three Snail Skill will require a regular Snail shell on Level 1, but on Level 2, you'll need Blue Snail shells. You'll have to really think and calculate which skills will maximize your hunting abilities.

To use a skill, it'll be much easier for you if you assign the skills on the #bQuick Slot#k at the bottom right of the screen. Just drag the skill icon on the skill window to one of the slots, and you're set to go. It'll be easier for you to just attack regularly at this point, but once you make the job advancement and earn more sophisticated skills, those skills will help you tremendously with everything.

This covers everything on skills. As a gift, I have just given you an item you can wear on your head, so use it wisely. Go to your item inventory and #bdouble-click on the item#k to equip it immediately. To #bmake sure you're equipped with it,#k press #bE#k. Happy traveling!

Hmmm... It looks like Todd taught you how to hunt, but you haven't really put that to practice. Either that, or you forgot to pick up the dropping. Press #bCtrl#k to attack #rJr. Sentinel#k, and pick up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k.

Eh? You haven't gone to see #bPeter#k yet? Don't be shy. Just hunt the #rJr. Sentinel#k, pick up #bJr. Sentinel's Shellpiece#k, and give it to him. He'll be more than happy to teach you how to use skills.

Hmmm... It looks like Todd taught you how to hunt, but you haven't really put that to practice. Either that, or you forgot to pick up the dropping. Press #bCtrl#k to attack #rJr. Sentinel#k, and pick up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k.

Oh... A new traveler! Since you're at Level 2, you should have some #bAP#k with you. Did you #bdistribute the AP#k? If you are unfamiliar with AP, then allow me to teach you a thing or two. I will give you a #bquiz#k that will help you understand the concept behind stats, AP, and ultimately, job advancement.

Now, click on me once more to ask some questions that you would like to be answered. I will explain it to you in great detail, one by one. Once you feel like you have this figured out, click on the #bRobin the Walking Encyclopedia#k quest to start the quiz.
Oh ho... You must be confident that you can answer everything! It's never a bad idea to test your knowledge every once in a while.

You must be ready for the quiz. Okay, let's start with this. First question! Whenever you level up, you will acquire some #bAbility Points, AP for short#k, and you will use that to raise your #bSTR, INT, DEX, and LUK#k. The question is, is it possible to raise #bHP and MP#k using your AP as a #rBeginner#k? \r\n#b#L0# Yes, it's possible. #l\r\n#L1# No, it's not possible. #l

That is correct! You can only start raising your HP and MP using your AP after making the first job advancement. You can't do that right now. Next question! You may be a beginner right now, but after you reach a certain level, you can make a job advancement. #bNormally, you'll have to be at Level 10 to make the job advancement,#k but #byou can make a job advancement at Level 8 with this job#k. What would that be?
#b#L0# Warrior #l
#L1# Magician #l 
#b#L2# Bowman #l 
#b#L3# Thief #l 
#b#L4# Pirate#l

That is correct! Only the Magicians can make the job advancement at Level 8. Last question! Here's a list of jobs and the places you need to visit to make the job advancement. #bWhich of these do not match?#k
#b#L0# Warrior - Perion #l
#L1# Magician - Ellinia #l 
#b#L2# Bowman - Henesys 
#b#L3# Thief - Nautilus

That is correct! #bThieves can make the job advancement at Kerning City#k! As for The Nautilus, #bPirates can make the job advancement there#k! Bravo! You seem to know a great deal about the AP, stats, and job advancements! I think you should have no trouble picking out a job for yourself when the time comes.

I highly advise you to plan ahead and think of what job you'd like to take up on while you're in the beginner stage, or even before that. Just know that when you make your job advancement, your AP will be realigned to fit your new job, so you won't need to worry about that. I do think it'll be much better off if you plan ahead and figure out what you want to become before making the job advancement.
Incorrect! You can only start increasing your HP and MP by using your AP AFTER making the job advancement. Start over!

Incorrect! Only the Magicians can make the job advancement at Level 8. That's because the users that have raised INT to become a Magician will have a rough time leveling up in the beginning. Start over!

Welcome, #h #, to AdventureMS! You can treat #bZone 1#k like a tutorial. You'll have to pay attention to what NPC's are saying, your quest log and the general environment.

You'll get special quest items with clues to locations. If you feel lost, take time to think about where you last left off and what you should be working toward! In this zone, you'll get a couple different types of quests that give you an extremely brief glimpse into what AdventureMS is about!

Now, we'll start your first quest:

I'm Sam, the town ranger. I'm in charge of keeping this town clean.

There's a #rboss snail#k running things round here, makin me look bad, we gotta find em. If you take care of some #rsnails#k, I could give you my #rkey#k to the town #bGarden#k. He was last spotted somewhere in the #bGarden#k.

The leaders of this town are offering a pretty good reward for taking the boss down. What do you think?
Alright, let's get started! Go ahead and take out #r30 snails#k and report back to me!
Sometimes, you have to accept quests to progress through the zones, this is one of those times...
Hmmm... Not sure if I should trust you yet. Please hunt #r30 snails#k first then talk to me.
